watchlists.Title: Robin Hood
watchlists.Actors: Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett, Max von Sydow, William Hurt
watchlists.Plot: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.
watchlists.Writer: Brian Helgeland (screenplay), Brian Helgeland (story), Ethan Reiff (story), Cyrus Voris (story)

watchlists.Title: The Avengers
watchlists.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
watchlists.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 79 nominations.
watchlists.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
watchlists.Writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)

watchlists.Title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
watchlists.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
watchlists.Plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.
watchlists.Writer: Joss Whedon, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel comics by), Joe Simon (character created by: Captain America), Jack Kirby (character created by: Captain America), Jim Starlin (character created by: Thanos)

watchlists.Title: Iron Man
watchlists.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges, Gwyneth Paltrow
watchlists.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 20 wins & 65 nominations.
watchlists.Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
watchlists.Writer: Mark Fergus (screenplay), Hawk Ostby (screenplay), Art Marcum (screenplay), Matt Holloway (screenplay), Stan Lee (characters), Don Heck (characters), Larry Lieber (characters), Jack Kirby (characters)
